feed.title: Category: design | Random thoughts | Hari KT

entry.title: Yahoo with the new redesign
entry.content: I recently read some where the design of yahoo is being changing . The new CEO has asked for the new design . Yes today I was really excited to see the new design . Every one loves a change, and I love the design in the first look itself . Its having wonderful features like Gmail , AOL mail preview . Just took the screen shot of the old and new look for you . I hope every one will love the new look .
